Subject: Upcoming Company Wellness Day

Dear Team,

I am pleased to announce that our company will be hosting a Wellness Day on [date]. This day is dedicated to promoting health and well-being among our employees, and we have planned a variety of activities and programs to support this initiative.

On Wellness Day, employees will have the opportunity to participate in activities such as yoga, meditation sessions, healthy cooking demonstrations, and health screenings. We will also be providing nutritious snacks and refreshments throughout the day.

Please mark your calendars and make plans to join us for this special event. More details will be shared in the coming weeks, including the schedule of activities and how to sign up for specific sessions.

We believe that prioritizing employee well-being is essential to creating a positive and productive work environment, and we hope that Wellness Day will provide you with valuable tools and resources to support your health and wellness goals.

If you have any questions or suggestions for Wellness Day, please don't hesitate to reach out to the HR team. We look forward to seeing you all there!

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Company Name] HR Department
